short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Close Miro tab after open shared link in desktop app

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically close the Miro Shared Link tab when you open it in Miro Desktop. Shared links contain the "share_link_id" key in the URL.

Left click on the icon to disable the extension, right click to go to the timer options.
